title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes in the Microwave

Directions.1: Poke holes along each side of the sweet potato with a fork, at least 4 sets on each side.

Directions.2: Microwave the potato on high for 8 minutes. Turn over and continue to cook in the microwave until tender, about 8 minutes more.

Directions.3: Cut potato in half and remove soft potato flesh into a bowl with a spoon. Mash the potato with a fork and mix with cream cheese and butter.
